TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputSession implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession

Docs.summary: Defines the interface for the session implemented on the receiving side of a one-way communication between messaging endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks On the other side of the message interchange, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> interface represents an outgoing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession> implemented on the sending side of a one-way communication between messaging endpoints. Note these two sessions are distinct.
